remarks: Each member of an ordered pair belongs to the union of the union of a class to which the ordered pair belongs.  Lemma 3D of [Enderton] p. 41. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
opeluu.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opeluu.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opeluu $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. C -> ( A e. U. U. C /\ B e. U. U. C ) ) $.
